Desc: Attack range: 2. The attack area is different when attacking enemies in diagonals.
Name: Rock Cannon - Basic Attack

Desc: Attack range: 2. Also inflicts Stun to prevent enemy from acting. The attack area is different when attacking enemies in diagonals.
Name: Flash Shot

Desc: Attack range: 3. Also inflicts Stun to prevent enemy from acting. The attack area is different when attacking enemies in diagonals.
Name: Full Burst

Desc: Attack range: 1. Gains a bonus round upon hitting an enemy.
Name: Black Blade - Basic Attack

Desc: Deals +1 DMG, gains +2 Movement, and becomes able to cross enemy units in the current round.
Name: Burning Heart

Desc: Attack range: 1. Attacks 3 enemy units in the horizontal direction. Gains a bonus round upon hitting an enemy.
Name: Flame Slash

Desc: Deals 2 DMG and summons Lucia to launch an assist attack.
Name: Crimson Crystal

Desc: Moves up to 3 blocks, dealing 2 DMG near the takeoff and landing positions.
Name: Crimson Chakram

Desc: Deals 4 DMG and summons Lucia to launch an assist attack.
Name: Whisper of Annihilation

Desc: Deals 5 DMG, permanently increases damage and range by 1 for the first 3 casts, and summons Lucia to aid on the battlefield.
Name: Descending Moon

Desc: Deals 6 DMG (the lightning around the blade has altered the refractive index of light, making the sword invisible).
Name: Crimson Slash

Desc: Moves up to 4 blocks and deals 9 DMG to enemies along the path.
Name: Crimson Flash

Desc: Swaps positions with Luna, dealing 6 DMG to nearby enemies upon landing.
Name: Drifting Shadow

Desc: <color=#FFD584>Cross</color>: <color=#FFD584>Bigger Range</color>. <color=#FFD584>Diagonals</color>: <color=#FFD584>Greater DMG</color>. Gains <color=#FFD584>Rage +15</color> on hit.
Name: Lash

Desc: <color=#FFD584>During the ongoing turn</color>, <color=#FFD584>becomes immune to damage once</color>. Upon a successful block, gains <color=#FFD584>Rage +50</color>.
Name: Block

Desc: During the <color=#FFD584>ongoing turn</color>, becomes <color=#FFD584>immune to damage once</color>. Upon blocking an attack successfully, <color=#FFD584>counterattacks and repels an adjacent enemy</color>. (Boss cannot be repelled.)\n\nIf the <color=#FFD584>repelled</color> enemy <color=#FFD584>bumps into a terrain/unit</color>, they will take <color=#FFD584>10 collision damage.</color> (The other unit takes the same amount of damage.)
Name: Soulflame: Counterattack

Desc: Deals damage to <color=#FFD584>all enemies within range</color>. Gains <color=#FFD584>Rage +15</color> on hit. <color=#FFD584>Each additional enemy hit</color> grants <color=#FFD584>Rage +5</color>.
Name: Onwards

Desc: Deals damage to <color=#FFD584>all enemies within a bigger</color> range.
Name: Soulflame: Burst

Desc: <color=#FFD584>Can be cast</color> at full Rage. Teleports to a <color=#FFD584>square adjacent to</color> any unit and deals <color=#FFD584>AOE DMG</color>. If <color=#FFD584>any enemy is killed</color>, <color=#FFD584>refreshes the skill cooldown</color> and increases <color=#FFD584>Rage cost, damage, and range</color> when casting the skill next time.
Name: Soulflame: Incineration

Desc: Deals damage to the target
Name: Done With Reasoning

Desc: Deals damage to all targets within range
Desc2: Deals damage to targets within a larger area and reduces the skill cooldown [Signature Enhancement].
Name: Wrench Is Power

Desc: Enhancement Obtained: <color=#FFD584>Movement Range +1</color>.\n[Wrench Is Power] has a <color=#FFD584>larger range</color> and <color=#FFD584>shorter cooldown</color>\nThe enhancement lasts for 5 turns.
Name: Super Enhancement

Desc: Deals damage to the target
Name: Poke You

Desc: Switches to the White Form every <color=#FFD584>4 turns</color>. Currently has <color=#FFD584>DMG Taken From White Squares +5</color>. When attacked, has <color=#FFD584>Form Switch Interval -1</color>.
Name: Black Shark-speare

Desc: Thunderstrikes all <color=#FFD584>black squares</color>.
Name: Black Shark Thunderstrike

Desc: Enters <color=#FFD584>damage-immune charging status</color> and summons multiple temporary chess pieces to assist. After 4 turns, <color=#FFD584>thunderstrikes all squares</color> and destroys all temporary chess pieces.
Name: Overwhelming Shark-speare

Desc: Deals damage to the target
Name: Poke You

Desc: Switches to the Black Form every <color=#FFD584>4 turns</color>. Currently has <color=#FFD584>DMG Taken From Black Squares +5</color>. When attacked, has <color=#FFD584>Form Switch Interval -1</color>.
Name: White Shark-speare

Desc: The skill is sealed by default. If <color=#FFD584>not injured</color> by the end of each turn, then <color=#FFD584>casts the skill next turn</color>, thunderstriking all <color=#FFD584>white squares</color>.
Name: White Shark Thunderstrike

Desc: Enters <color=#FFD584>damage-immune charging status</color> and summons multiple temporary chess pieces to assist. After 4 turns, <color=#FFD584>thunderstrikes all squares</color> and destroys all temporary chess pieces.
Name: Overwhelming Shark-speare

Name: Lash
